body:
I'm not really seeing how I can do exactly what I'm looking to do in `packages.yaml` in the documentation or in other issues I've searched. I understand the versions and variants settings, but for my application Nalu, I want to set a specific set of TPL versions and variants for only Nalu, i.e. how do I encode the following line in `packages.yaml` to always be enforced for only Nalu while not enforcing variants and versions per package:

```
spack install nalu \
^trilinos~alloptpkgs~xsdkflags~metis~mumps~superlu-dist+superlu~hypre+hdf5~suite-sparse~python~shared~debug+boost+tpetra~epetra~epetraext+exodus+pnetcdf+zlib+stk~teuchos+belos+zoltan+zoltan2~amesos+amesos2~ifpack+ifpack2+muelu~fortran~ml+gtest~aztec~sacado~x11+instantiate~instantiate_cmplx~dtk@master \
^openmpi@1.10.3 \
^boost@1.60.0 \
^cmake@3.6.1 \
^hdf5@1.8.16 \
^netcdf@4.3.3.1 \
^parallel-netcdf@1.6.1 \
^superlu@4.3
```
title: Packages.yaml Question
